body_html: @georgedahl thank you very much! I took a look at RMSProp algorithm with Nesterov momentum presented in Bengio's deep learning, you can record a variable like timestamp to calculate how many times you have not multiplied decay rate, but the simple implement is good enough maybe.
body_text: @georgedahl thank you very much! I took a look at RMSProp algorithm with Nesterov momentum presented in Bengio's deep learning, you can record a variable like timestamp to calculate how many times you have not multiplied decay rate, but the simple implement is good enough maybe.
body: @georgedahl thank you very much! I took a look at `RMSProp algorithm with Nesterov momentum` presented in Bengio's `deep learning`, you can record a variable like timestamp to calculate how many times you have not multiplied `decay rate`, but the simple implement is good enough maybe.
